title: Grateful Dead Live at Boston Garden on 1981-03-12
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab > R8Brain > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 Tagged. Transfer by Andrew F. 09/2010
source: AUD: 3x Nakamichi CM300/CP4's shotguns > Nakamichi 550 > Maxell XLII-S 90's, set up center balcony facing stage, section 102. Taped by Tim Friend.
